lyrics.text:
God is so good,
God is so good,
God is so good,
God's so good to me.

God cares for me,
God cares for me,
God cares for me,
God's so good to me.

God loves me so,
God loves me so,
God loves me so,
God's so good to me.

God is so good,
God is so good,
God is so good,
God's so good to me.
